pkgmetadata.longdescription: Microsoft Azure SDK for Python==============================This is the Microsoft Azure Data Lake Management namespace package.This package is not intended to be installed directly by the end user.Since version 3.0, this is Python 2 package only, Python 3.x SDKs will use `PEP420 <https://www.python.org/dev/peps/pep-0420/>`__ as namespace package strategy.To avoid issues with package servers that does not support `python_requires`, a Python 3 package is installed but is empty.It provides the necessary files for other packages to extend the azure.mgmt.datalake namespace.If you are looking to install the Azure client libraries, see the`azure <https://pypi.python.org/pypi/azure>`__ bundle package.
